name: vscode-kubernetes-tools
description: Develop, deploy and debug Kubernetes applications

vs-kubernetes.namespace.description: The namespace to use for all commands

vs-kubernetes.kubectl-path.description: [deprecated - use top level property] File path to a kubectl binary.

vs-kubernetes.helm-path.description: [deprecated - use top level property] File path to a helm binary.

vs-kubernetes.minikube-path.description: [deprecated - use top level property] File path to a minikube binary.

vs-kubernetes.kubectl-path.windows.description: [deprecated - use top level property] File path to a kubectl binary.

vs-kubernetes.helm-path.windows.description: [deprecated - use top level property] File path to a helm binary.

vs-kubernetes.minikube-path.windows.description: [deprecated - use top level property] File path to a minikube binary.

vs-kubernetes.kubectl-path.mac.description: [deprecated - use top level property] File path to a kubectl binary.

vs-kubernetes.helm-path.mac.description: [deprecated - use top level property] File path to a helm binary.

vs-kubernetes.minikube-path.mac.description: [deprecated - use top level property] File path to a minikube binary.

vs-kubernetes.kubectl-path.linux.description: [deprecated - use top level property] File path to a kubectl binary.

vs-kubernetes.helm-path.linux.description: [deprecated - use top level property] File path to a helm binary.

vs-kubernetes.minikube-path.linux.description: [deprecated - use top level property] File path to a minikube binary.

vs-kubernetes.kubectlVersioning.description: Whether to use the kubectl binary you provide ('user-provided'), or to automatically download the right version of kubectl for each cluster ('infer').

vs-kubernetes.kubeconfig.description: File path to the kubeconfig file.

vs-kubernetes.knownKubeconfigs.description: File paths to kubeconfig files from which you can select.

vs-kubernetes.autoCleanupOnDebugTerminat.description: Once the debug session is terminated, automatically clean up the created Deployment and associated Pod by the command "Kubernetes: Debug (Launch)".

vs-kubernetes.outputFormat.description: Output format for Kubernetes specs. One of 'json' or 'yaml' (default).

vs-kubernetes.nodejs-autodetect-remote-r.description: If true will try to automatically get the root location of the source code in the container (nodejs).

vs-kubernetes.nodejs-remote-root.description: The root location of the source code in the container (nodejs).

vs-kubernetes.nodejs-debug-port.description: Remote debugging port for nodejs. Usually 9229.

checkForMinikubeUpgrade.description: Notify on startup if update is available for minikube

disable-lint.description: Disable all linting of Kubernetes files

disable-linters.description: List of linters by name to disable

resource-commands-on-files.description: If true, show Kubernetes resource commands on file context menu for all YAML files

imageBuildTool.description: Container image build tool. By default, Docker.

vs-kubernetes.python-autodetect-remote-r.description: If true will try to automatically get the root location of the source code in the container (Python).

vs-kubernetes.python-remote-root.description: The root location of the source code in the container (Python).

vs-kubernetes.python-debug-port.description: Remote debugging port for Python. Usually 5678.

vs-kubernetes.dotnet-vsdbg-path.description: The path to the vsdbg debugger in the container (.NET).

vs-kubernetes.dotnet-source-file-map.description: The compilation root for the vsdbg debugger in order to have a sourceFileMap in the attach configuration of debug (.NET).

vs-kubernetes.debug-just-my-code.description: Enable/disable justMyCode debug configuration property for .NET, Python.

vs-kubernetes.resources-to-watch.description: List of resources to be watched.

vs-kubernetes.enable-snap-flag.description: Enables compatibility with instances of VS Code that were installed using snap.

vs-kubernetes.disable-context-info-statu.description: Disable displaying your current Kubernetes context in VS Code's status bar.

vs-kubernetes.disable-namespace-info-sta.description: Disable displaying your current Kubernetes namespace in VS Code's status bar.

vs-kubernetes.local-tunnel-debug-provide.description: Configure the Local Tunnel debug provider you want to use by default.

vs-kubernetes.enable-minimal-workflow.description: Enables the minimal workflow for several actions (Get, Describe, Scale, Expose, Switch). It reduces the queries to the cluster but the guided prompt has limited options.

vs-kubernetes.suppress-kubectl-not-found.description: Suppresses the display of warnings if no kubectl binary is available

vs-kubernetes.suppress-helm-not-found-al.description: Suppresses the display of warnings if no helm binary is available

vs-kubernetes.ignore-recommendations.description: Set to true to silence Kubernetes extension recommendation notifications.

vs-kubernetes.crd-code-completion.description: Set the smart code completion for CRDs. This would always prevent/allow the plugin to fetch all custom schemas from all CRDs on cluster, despite of their number.

vs-kubernetes.supress-output.description: Set to true to disable showing and stealing focus by Helm channel output window

vs-kubernetes.minikube-show-information-.description: Set installation expiration for displaying minikube installation dialog box.

vsdocker.imageUser.description: Image prefix for docker images ie 'docker.io/brendanburns'

vscode-kubernetes.kubectl-path.title: Path to kubectl
vscode-kubernetes.kubectl-path.description: File path to a kubectl binary. (You can override this on a per-OS basis if required).

vscode-kubernetes.helm-path.title: Helm path
vscode-kubernetes.helm-path.description: File path to a helm binary. (You can override this on a per-OS basis if required).

vscode-kubernetes.minikube-path.title: Minikube path
vscode-kubernetes.minikube-path.description: File path to a minikube binary. (You can override this on a per-OS basis if required).

vscode-kubernetes.kubectl-path-windows.title: Path to kubectl (Windows)
vscode-kubernetes.kubectl-path-windows.description: File path to a kubectl binary.

vscode-kubernetes.helm-path-windows.title: Helm path (Windows)
vscode-kubernetes.helm-path-windows.description: File path to a helm binary.

vscode-kubernetes.minikube-path-windows.title: Minikube path (Windows)
vscode-kubernetes.minikube-path-windows.description: File path to a minikube binary.

vscode-kubernetes.kubectl-path-mac.title: Path to kubectl (Mac)
vscode-kubernetes.kubectl-path-mac.description: File path to a kubectl binary.

vscode-kubernetes.helm-path-mac.title: Helm path (Mac)
vscode-kubernetes.helm-path-mac.description: File path to a helm binary.

vscode-kubernetes.minikube-path-mac.title: Minikube path (Mac)
vscode-kubernetes.minikube-path-mac.description: File path to a minikube binary.

vscode-kubernetes.kubectl-path-linux.title: Path to kubectl (Linux)
vscode-kubernetes.kubectl-path-linux.description: File path to a kubectl binary.

vscode-kubernetes.helm-path-linux.title: Helm path (Linux)
vscode-kubernetes.helm-path-linux.description: File path to a helm binary.

vscode-kubernetes.minikube-path-linux.title: Minikube path (Linux)
vscode-kubernetes.minikube-path-linux.description: File path to a minikube binary.

vscode-kubernetes.log-viewer.follow.description: Set to true to follow logs by default in the log viewer.

vscode-kubernetes.log-viewer.timestamp.description: Set to true to show timestamps by default in the log viewer.

vscode-kubernetes.log-viewer.since.description: How far back to fetch logs from in seconds by default. Set to -1 for all logs.

vscode-kubernetes.log-viewer.tail.description: The number of recent logs to display by default in the log viewer. Set to -1 for all log lines.

vscode-kubernetes.log-viewer.destination.description: Where to display logs, defaults to the dedicated Webview.

vscode-kubernetes.log-viewer.wrap.description: Set to true to wrap lines by default in the log viewer.

vscode-kubernetes.log-viewer.autorun.description: Set to true to automatically begin fetching logs once the log viewer is opened using the default settings.

commands.title: Find Local Tunnel Debug Providers on Marketplace
Version
commands.description: Get the version of the local Helm client.

commands.title: Lint
commands.description: Run the Helm linter on this chart.

commands.title: Dependency Update
commands.description: Update the dependencies listed in requirements.yaml.

commands.title: Dry Run
commands.description: Run 'helm install --dry-run --debug' on this chart.

commands.title: Template
commands.description: Run 'helm template' on this chart.

commands.title: Insert Dependency
commands.description: Insert a dependency YAML fragment

commands.title: Preview Template
commands.description: Run 'helm template' on this chart and show only this file.

commands.title: Fetch values
commands.description: Fetches values.yaml from the chart

commands.title: Inspect Chart
commands.description: Inspect a Helm Chart

commands.title: Create Chart
commands.description: Create a new Helm Chart

commands.title: Convert to Template
commands.description: Convert this manifest to a Helm template

commands.title: Convert to Template Parameter
commands.description: Convert this value to a Helm template parameter

commands.title: Get Release
commands.description: Get a Helm release from the cluster

commands.title: Package
commands.description: Package a chart directory into a versioned chart archive file.

commands.title: Fetch
commands.description: Fetch a Helm chart into the current project

commands.title: Install
commands.description: Install a Helm chart into the cluster

commands.title: Uninstall
commands.description: Uninstall a Helm release

commands.title: Rollback
commands.description: Rollback Helm Release

commands.title: Show Dependencies
commands.description: List the dependencies of a Helm chart

commands.title: Merge into Kubeconfig
commands.description: Merge the cluster's kubeconfig into your existing kubeconfig

commands.title: Save Kubeconfig
commands.description: Save the cluster's kubeconfig as a kubeconfig file

commands.title: Find Cloud Providers on Marketplace
commands.description: Find extensions that add clouds to the Cloud Explorer

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run vscode:prepublish:ext && npm run vscode:prepublish:view
scripts.compile: npm run compile:ext && npm run compile:view
